home.title: TG MiniApp Example
home.description:
This is a simple repository that can be used as a starting point for your project. The template is based on Vue.js and includes a UI library and a set of icons.
For convenience, the template uses an ORM client for PostgreSQL and MinIO as an S3-compatible data storage, which can later be integrated with the database.
Express.js is used to handle API endpoints, and AioGram (Python) is used to interact with the Telegram API.
home.hint: To check the API status, you can open the settings tab via the dock button or by clicking the button.

need_auth.title: Not in Telegram
need_auth.hint: Please open this app inside the Telegram Mini App.
